inapplicable.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

inapplicable.help: "role=text" should have no focusable descendants

ancestry: html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div > header:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(3) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
html > body > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(2) > div > div:nth-child(1) > div > div:nth-child(4) > div:nth-child(2) > h2:nth-child(1)
